1370: Marie was born in Breestraat in 1370.
Got married to Kolekinus at age 23 in 1370.
Gave birth to Hardenbernus in 1370 at age 23.
1379: Died while giving birth to Everyng in 1379 at age 32.
1371: Gave birth to Winrechus in 1371 at age 24.
Lost son Winrechus when Winrechus was 1 years old.
1372: Gave birth to Breghlent in 1372 at age 25.
1373: Gave birth to Vandelghis in 1373 at age 26.
1374: Lost son Vandelghis when Vandelghis was 2 years old.
1375: Gave birth to Aleydis in 1375 at age 28.
1376: Gave birth to Woltwigis in 1376 at age 29.
Lost daughter Aleydis when Aleydis was 2 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
